Reviews.Title: bad cameras
Reviews.Author: tavegas "tavegas"
Reviews.Content: I also tried this as lorex hard wired cameras are great for the price. it had a range of about 15 feet and the picture was very bad. pass on this system. x-10 is way better than this. they need to re-do this one or pull it off the market.

Reviews.Title: CRAP IN A BOX!
Reviews.Author: Shelby J. Tallent
Reviews.Content: I RETURNED THIS ITEM WITHIN A DAY! THE PICTURE WAS HORRIBLE.THE RANGE ALMOST NIL AND I WAS SO UNHAPPY.NEVER BUY THESE CAMERAS.

Reviews.Title: They worked Fine
Reviews.Author: Leesa "Leesa"
Reviews.Content: I bought these at BJ's Wholesale for about $150 and they worked fine for my purpose. I only needed them to catch some kids egging cars around the complex so. They covered about 2 1/2 parking spots and out to the road, it also had sound. It was dark but only because it was night-time and the inferred was in use. It served the purpose for the price because i could not afford the more expensive ones.
